name: picoXKCD - 64x64 comics #pico1k
description:
XKCD is an amazing web comic at http://xkcd.com licensed under Creative Commons (Non-commercial clause).

For the PICO-1K JAM. I wanted to see how well these comics could adapt to a ultra-minimal constraints:

  • whole program under 1024 characters (including encoded 1-bit images and text)
  • 64x64 resolution

Full code (1019 chars):
